alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:29AM EST until January 23 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOWFALL THROUGH MONDAY... .Low pressure will cross the Gulf of Maine today, continuing and in some cases increasing snowfall over the region. Although there will be somewhat of a lull during the first part of the day as the storm undergoes a bit of a transition entering the Gulf of Maine, the storm will strongly amplify and renew heavy snowfall over the warned area through today. Snowfall rates exceeding an inch per hour will be possible as banded snowfall organizes and translates across the forecast area by this afternoon and through the evening, bringing significant travel impacts for the entire day, particularly through the I-95 corridor and into the urbanized areas of southern New Hampshire during the evening commute. Snow will end from west to east through the evening hours as the system pulls away from New England. Gusty northwest winds of 25 to 35 mph will also be in play today and tonight, which may lead to a few power outages where wet and sticky snow from this morning clings to trees and power outages. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow and sleet accumulations between 2 and 4 inches for a storm total of 3 to 5 inches. North to northwest winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...An area of low pressure will bring a period of snowfall to the region. Travel will be impacted due to snowfall accumulations on roads. The potential exists for banded snowfall that will bring periods of locally heavy snowfall Monday afternoon, leading to rapid snow accumulations and extremely dangerous travel conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
